document_data.name: Triel Teienna
document_data.mainbody: '''Triel Teienna''' was a [[drow]] [[priestess]] of [[Lolth]] who served as the High Priestess of the [[Temple of Lolth (Bezantur)|Temple of Lolth]] in [[Bezantur]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She enjoyed indulging in opulent pleasures, and used her position within Bezantur's temple to engage in such pursuits.
document_data.Activities: While she was technically the overseer of Lolth's temple in Bezantur, Triel only visited once every few months. Whenever she did, she would always select a handful of the [[human]] members of the congregation to accompany her back to the [[Underdark]] to "live" with their drow "brethren". Naturally, these chosen individuals they were never seen again.
